subject: College Athletics
Bribery and Kickbacks
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mary E. Lyons, the University of San Diego president, said she has “unwavering support” for the men’s basketball Coach Bill Grier and Athletic Director Ky Snyder as the F.B.I. investigates.
snippet: Mary E. Lyons, the University of San Diego president, said she has “unwavering support” for the men’s basketball Coach Bill Grier and Athletic Director Ky Snyder as the F.B.I. investigates.
